IQBench - A Benchmark for Evaluating Fluid Intelligence of VLMs

By Tan-Hanh Pham, Phu-Vinh Nguyen, Dang The Hung, Bui Trong Duong, Vu Nguyen Thanh, Chris Ngo, Tri Quang Truong, Truong-Son Hy • May 20, 2025

Overview IQBench is a novel benchmark developed to evaluate the fluid intelligence of Vision-Language Models (VLMs) using standardized visual IQ tests. It features: 500 human-curated questions 10 reasoning domains Sources: Images sourced from online repositories, textbooks, and educational content. Editing: Images were cleaned or regenerated to ensure quality and legality....
